title: G-20, Democratic Debates & Iran
itunes:title: G-20, Democratic Debates & Iran
description:
Kevin spoke with Scott Mulhauser, Founder of Aperture Strategies, and Lauren Claffey, Republican Strategist, Managing Director at Hamilton Place Strategies. They discussed Iran, the upcoming Democratic presidential debates, immigration, and the G-20 summit.

Kevin also spoke with Eric Schultz, Senior Adviser to President Barack Obama and Founder and CEO, The Schultz Group. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
